mapper.update: update app_key_t set sz_key = #{szKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sz_ip_addrs = #{szIpAddrs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sz_org_id = #{szOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nt_api_ver = #{ntApiVer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ng_call_times = #{ngCallTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ts_created = #{tsCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ts_updated = #{tsUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nt_row_state = #{ntRowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nt_row_version = #{ntRowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sz_id = #{szId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
